entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
